name: A Liar's Dice
description:
Welcome to A Liar's Dice

You are in the world's dirtiest casino, where the poor get poorer and the rich get......poorer, but everyone here is different, everyone has RIGGED DICE so that you can decide what you roll. As the phycologist, you have a chart showing your opponent's emotions and what they might decide to put. Try to match their dice by putting the same number as them with the help of the chart in this high-speed dopamine-boosting game with clean art 

Have a Good Time!
